title: Dynamic Competency Allocation Strategy Design for Multi-Unit Organizations

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment incorporating digital device-based practice and discussion sessions; verification of practical application skills through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of structural social capital on exploratory knowledge learning through structural equation modeling.
Learners can explain the influence of relational social capital on exploitative/exploratory knowledge learning using empirical data.
Learners can model the impact of knowledge learning types (exploitative/exploratory) on dynamic capability allocation in multi-unit organizations.
Learners can propose organizational capability enhancement strategies linking social capital types and knowledge learning approaches.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
